thread.title: Best of both? Low-cost tracker funds with professional management on top
thread.title_full: Best of both? Low-cost tracker funds with professional management on top

author: Ed Monk
title: Best of both? Low-cost tracker funds with professional management on top
text: Why the new tax on buy-to-let is deeply unfair Best of both? Low-cost tracker funds with professional management on top Funds promising cheap exposure to markets but where professional fund managers oversee the asset allocation are taking off Passive mixed asset funds track markets underneath - but with finessing on top. Photo: Alamy By Ed Monk , Investment Editor 11:22AM BST 07 Aug 2015
